SummaryEnglish: Tokyo. Tomobiki Town. Lum, the gorgeous daughter of an invading race of Oni Aliens is smitten with High School student Ataru Moroboshi. A dedicated womanizer, Ataru is unfazed by Lum’s fierce electric shock attacks and continues his daily hunt for pretty girls. With a host of other unique characters, including classmate Shinobu, elegant shrine maiden Sakura, Lum’s best friend’s Oyuki, Benten and Ran, Buddhist Monk Cherry, Ten, the little brat, heir to a wealthy family Shutaro Mendo and the secretly female beauty Ryunosuke… A classic slapstick love comedy where anything goes!

1.TitleEnglish: Young Love on the Run / Between a Rock and a Hard Place
1.SummaryEnglish: To save Earth, unlucky Ataru must win a high-stakes game of tag against a beautiful alien. Luckily his friend Shinobu has offered a helping hand (in marriage) as motivation!

2.TitleEnglish: Present for You / The Yellow Ribbon of Happiness
2.SummaryEnglish: Ataru can run, but he can’t hide — not from Lum, and not from the gorgeous shrine maiden Sakura’s eagle eyes. She can tell at a glance that he’s in dire need of exorcism!

3.TitleEnglish: Trouble Rains Down!! / Amazed in a Maze
3.SummaryEnglish: Two’s company. Three’s a crowd. And when a FOURTH party enters the Lum/Ataru/Shinobu situation? Things get pretty scary in Ataru’s already complex love life!

4.SummaryEnglish: Lum ain’t the only alien princess in town. The new arrival has her sights set on a certain boy — but her vassals are keeping a scandalous secret from their ruler!

5.TitleEnglish: The Glove of Love and Conflict / How I've Waited for You…
5.SummaryEnglish: Hellooooo, nurse! A new nurse just started working at Ataru’s school, and she’s a total babe… but wait. Does she look familiar?

6.TitleEnglish: Good Day for a Departure / Oyuki / Ataru Retires
6.SummaryEnglish: They say all’s fair in love and war, and that’s why Lum drags Ataru kicking and screaming onto a battlefield!

7.TitleEnglish: Home Is Where You Find It / Marine Garbage Disposal
7.SummaryEnglish: A monster lurks in the depths of the hotel pool, but it’s not half as creepy as the ne’er-do-wells lurking around Nurse Sakura at the beach…

8.TitleEnglish: Transfer Student Close Call… / Farewell Party Close Call…
8.SummaryEnglish: Is Ataru seeing double, or are there really two hot new transfer students at school? And what does the super cute newbie Ran want from him and Lum!?

9.TitleEnglish: To Kill With Love / Studying Mayhem
9.SummaryEnglish: An ominous omen. A pessimistic portent. A scary sign. Call it whatever you want, but one thing is clear: Fate will not be kind to Ataru today!

10.TitleEnglish: Parents' Day Horrors / Since Your Parting
10.SummaryEnglish: Are aliens invading again? Nope — it’s just Ataru, Meno and Lum’s mothers invading Parents’ Day! But a language barrier may turn this meeting of the moms into pure mania.

11.TitleEnglish: Mendo Siblings!! / A Strange New Year at the Mendo Estate
11.SummaryEnglish: What’s this? A handkerchief? It smells divine, so it MUST belong to a total hottie. Definitely not a nightmare creature or anything like that. Ataru’s nose cannot be fooled!

12.TitleEnglish: Ten Is Here / A Date for Just the Two of Us
12.SummaryEnglish: Lum’s cousin Ten thinks Lum should look for greener romantic pastures! And if Lum can’t see reason, Ten will burn her relationship with Ataru to the ground.

13.TitleEnglish: The Great Off-Campus Snack Battle / A Gift From Ten!!
13.SummaryEnglish: The girls in class aren’t the only snacks Ataru has his eye on. When teachers crack down on off-campus snacking, a no-holds-barred snack battle begins!

14.TitleEnglish: That Mizunokoji Boy / Love Letter Trouble
14.SummaryEnglish: All’s fair in love and… baseball? It’s time for a showdown on the baseball diamond! And once the dust settles, a “love letter” stirs up trouble.

15.TitleEnglish: Anko Pathos, the Taste of Love?! / Memories and a Close Call… / Adverse Effects
15.SummaryEnglish: Lum and Ran are friends, but one can best describe their relationship as prickly.

16.SummaryEnglish: Ataru and his friends were supposed to have a fun beach trip, but they find themselves swept up in Ryunosuke’s family drama instead!

17.TitleEnglish: A Chest Full of Longing!! / Wish Upon a Star
17.SummaryEnglish: Ryunosuke teams up with three delinquents to help Shinobu ward off an unwanted suitor. Later, Ataru’s family must be careful what they wish for.

18.TitleEnglish: Indelible Lipstick Magic!! / Lethal Attacks: Yaminabe!
18.SummaryEnglish: There is nothing suspicious about the lipstick Lum wants to put on Ataru. Nope, nothing suspicious at all. Later, Ataru’s class takes the dreaded Yaminabe food challenge!

19.TitleEnglish: Magic Realm! Jungle of Terror / Pickled
19.SummaryEnglish: Pro tip: never hurt an octopus’ feelings and never give an oni pickled plums.

20.SummaryEnglish: Three punks challenge Lum and her friends to a duel after stealing Benten’s precious chain.

21.TitleEnglish: Cosmo Teacher CAO-2 / Ooh, Scary! Voodoo Doll
21.SummaryEnglish: Lum and her friends worry the past will come back to haunt them. Later, Mendo’s life becomes much more complicated thanks to a voodoo doll.

22.TitleEnglish: Big Bottle, Little Bottle / When Love Strikes
22.SummaryEnglish: Lum is quite the handful, no matter what size she is. Later, a shapeshifting fox takes a liking to Shinobu.

23.TitleEnglish: Title Match!! The Tomo-1 Queen Contest
23.SummaryEnglish: The finalists have different motives. Lum wants Ataru’s attention, Ran wants to get in Lum’s way, Shinobu and Sakura want the money, and Ryunosuke has something to prove.

1.TitleEnglish: Fantasy Balloon Gum / Love Knows No Barriers
1.SummaryEnglish: Surely Ataru wouldn’t misuse bubble gum that has the power to create whatever he wants. But would that be worse than Lum losing the ability to speak other languages?

2.TitleEnglish: Trickle of Memories / Album of Memories / The Home Visit Blues: Feuding Fujinami Edition
2.SummaryEnglish: Ryunosuke grew up without a mother and wants to know more about her. Unfortunately, her father is keeping an important detail from her.

3.SummaryEnglish: Lum has a new suitor, but it doesn’t take long before there’s trouble in paradise.

4.SummaryEnglish: Relationship drama swiftly follows when Kurama sets her eyes on Rei. Speaking of relationships, Mendo discovers that he’s engaged to Tobimaro’s sister.

5.TitleEnglish: The Continuation of: That Mizunokoji Girl
5.SummaryEnglish: As Mendo desperately tries to escape his unwanted engagement, Asuka’s upbringing gives a whole new meaning to the term sheltered.

6.TitleEnglish: Kotatsu Love / Lum Becomes a Cow / The Home Visit Blues: Luxurious Mendo Edition
6.SummaryEnglish: Life is full of unexpected events, like an extra lively kotatsu purchase and Lum believing she’s turning into a cow.

7.SummaryEnglish: No good can come of Ataru and Ten switching bodies, nor using Lum’s shortcut to get to school on time.

8.SummaryEnglish: Shinobu, Lum, and Ataru take an unexpected trip to the future. The good news is they discover who their spouses are. The bad news is their disappointment is immeasurable.

9.TitleEnglish: Open the Door: Part 2 / The Home Visit Blues: Prohibitive Miyake Edition
9.SummaryEnglish: The trio are determined to find their ideal futures, but each one they find leave them unsatisfied. And Inaba’s coworkers are not happy with the group’s meddling.

10.SummaryEnglish: Whether it’s an octopus or a girl burdened by regrets, spirits need assistance from the living. Unexpectedly, Mendo and Ataru find themselves navigating these burdens.

11.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Battered Principal / The Secret Flower Garden / The Home Visit Blues: Hellish Moroboshi Edition
11.SummaryEnglish: Whodunit? No one saw what happened to the principal despite all of them being in the same room. Later, chaos ensues when flowers start spreading rumors around town.

12.TitleEnglish: Lovely Darling in Danger!! / Foxes in the Moonlight / The Home Visit Blues: Mark Onsen Goes to Space
12.SummaryEnglish: Lum finds herself in a race against time to save Ataru. Later, a certain fox seeks to recreate an old legend with magic horsetail shoots. Even later, Mark meets Lum’s parents.

14.TitleEnglish: Asuka Returns / A Stormy Date: Part 1
14.SummaryEnglish: Asuka’s mother hatches a plan to help her daughter overcome her fear of men. It appears that drastic measures are on the horizon.

15.SummaryEnglish: Asuka and Mendo go on a date and to say things don’t go as planned would be a vast understatement.

16.SummaryEnglish: Ryunosuke and her father are now the proud owners of a seaside cafe and an island after paying a suspiciously cheap price! Later, a fairy asks Ten to find his missing parasol.

17.TitleEnglish: One Night's Battle / Deadly Peril in the Classroom
17.SummaryEnglish: Nagisa needs a kiss from Ryunosuke to pass on, which is easier said than done. Later, Mark threatens his class with supplementary lessons if he catches them talking.

18.TitleEnglish: Flower Petals of Love and Courage
18.SummaryEnglish: Inaba returns and has an important question for Shinobu.

19.SummaryEnglish: Ten must apologize for ruining Ataru’s scarf, but how? Later, candy hearts have the same effect as love potions. Meanwhile, the Dark Dominion lies on the horizon.

20.TitleEnglish: Boy Meets Girl: The Morning of Farewell
20.SummaryEnglish: Lum is not happy when she learns she’s being forced into an arranged marriage thanks to her great grandfather.

21.TitleEnglish: Boy Meets Girl: Are You Really Getting Married?
21.SummaryEnglish: Ataru and Mendo team up with Lum’s friends to save her from a forced marriage. But they aren’t the only ones who’re trying to stop the wedding.

22.SummaryEnglish: What started as a misunderstanding ends in a falling out. Now Lum refuses to return until Ataru apologizes.

23.TitleEnglish: Boy Meets Girl: I Want You When I Can't Have You
23.SummaryEnglish: With the fate of the Earth on the line again, Lum and Ataru’s last game of tag begins.
